page.title: 08BLACK TORRINGTON SCHOOL
page.content: The school belongs to the Church of England.It opened in 1875 and takes children aged 4 to 11. We have infant and junior classrooms,a hall, kitchen, toilets, cloakroom and a swimming pool in the playground. At present we have 21 children. There is a headmaster, an infant teacher and a part-time teacher We have a project every term, and maths, English, science, music, R.E. and social studies. We play football, netball,rounders,cricket and athletics on the playing field. We have a school garden and pond in the churchyard. We perform a play most terms and have nature walks and visits to places of interest. On Thursdays we go to Holsworthy Sports Hall and we have clubs for woodwork, cookery and short tennis. SChool starts at nine o'clock and ends at 3.30. At age 11 children go to Holsworthy Community College.
